Updated Quick Kit Design Packs

January 23, 2024

Thank you all for your support! Thanks to "M" for reminding me to post the updated design packs that include the Waveshare display variants. Please find them below. These are complete packs with both frames for the traditional Pi Foundation display and the Waveshare version.

The links in this post may earn me a commission, but don't change prices for you. Thanks for your ongoing support!
